sentence.Network_en: His hard sinewy body advertised his ruthlessness of purpose.
sentence.Network_cn: 他健硕的身体使他显得意志尤为坚强。

sentence.Network_en: When muscles are exercised often and properly, they keep the arms firm and sinewy.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果能经常正确地锻炼肌肉的话，双臂就会一直结实而强健。

sentence.Network_en: His hard hands and sinewy sunburned limbs told of labor and endurance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他粗糙的双手,被太阳哂得发黑的健壮四肢,均表明他十分辛勤,非常耐劳.

list.abs: sinewy arms , legs , etc., 粗壮的手臂 , 腿等.

it is strongly emphasized that field conditioned coats , as well as brawny or sinewy muscular and honorable scars indicating a working and hunting dog are never to be penalized in this dog .需要重点强调的是能适应野外工作的被毛，尽可能强健而发达的肌肉，伤疤是工作犬及猎犬光荣的象征，不属于缺陷。
sinewy prose ., 强劲有力的散文.

entry.tran: 肌肉发达的;精壮的;强健的
entry.def: Someone who is sinewy has a lean body with strong muscles.

example.tran: 一名个子不高、肌肉发达的年轻男子

example.ex: When muscles are exercised often and properly, they keep the arms firm and sinewy.
example.tran: 如果能经常正确地锻炼肌肉的话，双臂就会一直结实而强健。

means.word_mean: 1. (of meat) full of sinews; especially impossible to chew
2. consisting of tendons or resembling a tendon
3. (of a person) possessing physical strength and weight; rugged and powerful;

auth_sentence.content: He returned to New York, sinewy and ferocious.
auth_sentence.res_content: He returned to New York, sinewy and ferocious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He returned to New York, sinewy and ferocious.

auth_sentence.content: The small body was sinewy and compact,...rippling with muscle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The small body was sinewy and compact,...rippling with muscle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The small body was sinewy and compact,...rippling with muscle.
